table_description: Year-wise report capturing wildlife population, tourist visits, and revenue generated from animal-focused tourism areas.

columns.focus_area: Designated thematic or administrative focus area for the wildlife and tourism data.
columns.year: Calendar year for which the data is recorded.
columns.number_of_mammals: Total count of mammal species recorded in the focus area for the given year.
columns.number_of_birds: Total count of bird species recorded in the focus area for the given year.
columns.number_of_reptiles: Total count of reptile species recorded in the focus area for the given year.
columns.total_number_of_animals: Aggregate count of all animal species recorded in the focus area.
columns.number_of_tourists_visited: Total number of tourists who visited the focus area in the given year.
columns.revenue_in_rupees: Total revenue generated in Indian rupees from tourism activities.
columns.place_name: Name of the wildlife location or tourist site.

table_description: District-wise geospatial analysis of forest cover in Bihar, including forest density classification and temporal change.

columns.district_name: Name of the district in Bihar.
columns.year: Year for which forest cover data is reported.
columns.calculated_area_soi_in_sq_km: Total surveyed geographical area based on Survey of India calculations in square kilometers.
columns.very_dense_forest_in_sq_km: Area covered by very dense forest in square kilometers.
columns.moderately_dense_forest_in_sq_km: Area covered by moderately dense forest in square kilometers.
columns.open_forest_in_sq_km: Area covered by open forest in square kilometers.
columns.total_forest_in_sq_km: Total forest area combining all forest density categories.
columns.soi_in_percentage: Percentage of forest area with respect to the total surveyed area.
columns.change_wrt_2021_in_percentage: Percentage change in forest cover compared to the year 2021.
columns.scrub_in_sq_km: Area classified as scrub land in square kilometers.
columns.focus_area: Thematic or policy focus area associated with the forest analysis.

table_description: Comparison of Bihar's forest cover with national forest statistics, categorized by forest ownership and protection type.

columns.state_name: Name of the state, primarily Bihar.
columns.geographical_area_in_km2: Total geographical area of the state in square kilometers.
columns.reserved_forest_in_km2: Area designated as reserved forest in square kilometers.
columns.protected_forest_in_km2: Area designated as protected forest in square kilometers.
columns.unclassed_forest_in_km2: Forest area not classified under reserved or protected categories.
columns.total_rfa_in_km2: Total recorded forest area in square kilometers.
columns.percentage_of_ga: Percentage of forest area relative to the total geographical area.
columns.year: Year for which the forest statistics are reported.
columns.focus_area: Analytical or policy focus area for national forest comparison.

table_description: District-wise annual report of forest area measured in hectares.

columns.forest_area_in_hectare: Total forest area of the district measured in hectares.
columns.year: Year of the forest area assessment.
columns.focus_area: Relevant focus area associated with forest reporting.

table_description: District-wise report on forest nurseries and availability of plants.

columns.total_number_of_nursery: Total number of nurseries operating in the district.
columns.total_number_of_available_plants: Total count of plants available across all nurseries.
columns.year: Year for which nursery data is recorded.
columns.focus_area: Policy or operational focus area related to nursery management.

table_description: State-wise report of recorded forest area, categorized by forest classification and expressed relative to total geographical area.

columns.state_name: Name of the state for which forest area data is recorded.
columns.geographical_area_in_km2: Total geographical area of the state measured in square kilometers.
columns.reserved_forest_in_km2: Area designated as reserved forest in square kilometers.
columns.protected_forest_in_km2: Area designated as protected forest in square kilometers.
columns.unclassed_forest_in_km2: Forest area not classified under reserved or protected categories.
columns.total_rfa_in_km2: Total recorded forest area in square kilometers.
columns.percentage_of_ga: Percentage of recorded forest area relative to the total geographical area.
columns.year: Year for which the recorded forest area statistics are reported.
columns.focus_area: Policy or analytical focus area associated with the forest area report.

table_description: State-wise report of recorded forest area, categorized by forest classification and expressed relative to total geographical area.

columns.state_name: Name of the state for which forest area data is recorded.
columns.geographical_area_in_km2: Total geographical area of the state measured in square kilometers.
columns.reserved_forest_in_km2: Area designated as reserved forest in square kilometers.
columns.protected_forest_in_km2: Area designated as protected forest in square kilometers.
columns.unclassed_forest_in_km2: Forest area not classified under reserved or protected categories.
columns.total_rfa_in_km2: Total recorded forest area in square kilometers.
columns.percentage_of_ga: Percentage of recorded forest area relative to the total geographical area.
columns.year: Year for which the recorded forest area statistics are reported.
columns.focus_area: Policy or analytical focus area associated with the forest area report.
